Pauline Scatton OBITUARY
Pauline Scatton OBITUARY
On Jan 24th, Pauline Scatton, 94, passed away peacefully and surrounded by loved ones at Mountain City Nursing Home, Hazleton, Pa.
She was born Feb 1, 1930 in Junedale, Pa to the late John Cisar and Mary Madyar. Pauline was an accomplished Italian cook and loved to cook delicious gourmet meals for her children and grandchildren. A Sunday afternoon was often filled with family, friends, football and delicious Italian food. She was a very giving person and would help anyone in need. She also loved to sew and fixed many garments for family and friends.
She was preceded in death by her husband Michael A. Scatton, son Michael Scatton, grandson Kevin Scatton, great grandchild, Rylan Larioni; siblings John, Joe, and Andy Cisar and Mary Karis.
She is survived by her sister, Anna Kassick, Humboldt, Pa; sons, Jeffry Scatton, Hazleton, Pa; Guy Scatton and his wife Theresa, Drums, Pa; Daughter in law Carmella Scatton, Hazleton, Pa; grandchildren Michael Scatton, Kristen Scatton, Christina Larioni, Kimberly Kilanowski, David Scatton, Steven Scatton, and Kathleen Scatton; and several great grandchildren.
Funeral Services will be held on Thursday, Feb 6, 2025 at Most Precious Blood Catholic Church, 4th and Seybert Sts, Hazleton, Pa. Friends may call at 9am followed by a mass of Christian Burial at 10am.
Pauline Scatton
January 24, 2025
